20110109010309.000|20110109010311.000|TR0|shooting of Arizona Congresswoman 
20110109010311.000|20110109010313.000|TR0|Gabrielle Giffords.  She was shot in the 
20110109010313.000|20110109010315.000|TR0|head today but survived and was rushed 
20110109010315.000|20110109010317.000|TR0|into surgery.  Her doctor now says he's,

20110109010319.000|20110109010321.000|TR0|chance of recovery.
20110109010321.000|20110109010323.000|TR0|
20110109010323.000|20110109010324.000|TR0|A gunman opened fire while Gifford was 
20110109010324.000|20110109010326.000|TR0|meeting with her constituents in a grocery 
20110109010326.000|20110109010328.000|TR0|store parking lot in Tucson, Arizona.  Six 
20110109010328.000|20110109010330.000|TR0|of the victims are dead.  Among them, a 
20110109010330.000|20110109010332.000|TR0|9-year-old girl, a federal judge, and the

20110109010334.000|20110109010336.000|TR0|outreach, Gabe Zimmerman. Giffords is 
20110109010336.000|20110109010338.000|TR0|among the 12 wounded.

20110109010342.000|20110109010343.000|TR0|custody.  He's identified as Jared Lee 
20110109010343.000|20110109010345.000|TR0|Loughner.

20110109010353.000|20110109010355.000|TR0|11:30 a.m. Tucson time.  That's noon to 
20110109010355.000|20110109010357.000|TR0|1:30 p.m. Eastern.  She was at a Safeway

20110109010633.000|20110109010635.000|TR0|gunman approached and started shooting.

20110109010637.000|20110109010639.000|TR0|the head, she's still alive and the

20110109010641.000|20110109010642.000|TR0|that she may survive.  Five people were

20110109010644.000|20110109010646.000|TR0|personal friends of mine, including 
20110109010646.000|20110109010648.000|TR0|Congresswoman Giffords.
20110109010648.000|20110109010650.000|TR0|
20110109010650.000|20110109010652.000|TR0|One being a federal judge, John Roll, who 
20110109010652.000|20110109010654.000|TR0|this morning got up like he does every 
20110109010654.000|20110109010656.000|TR0|Saturday morning went to mass because he 
20110109010656.000|20110109010658.000|TR0|knows Gabrielle very well, decided to come 
20110109010658.000|20110109010700.000|TR0|around the corner and say hi. 
20110109010700.000|20110109010701.000|TR0|Unfortunately, he was in the wrong place 
20110109010701.000|20110109010703.000|TR0|at the wrong time.  I have never met a 
20110109010703.000|20110109010705.000|TR0|more sincere, fair-minded, brilliant 
20110109010705.000|20110109010707.000|TR0|federal judge or any judge for that matter 
20110109010707.000|20110109010709.000|TR0|in my whole life.  John Roll has been on 
20110109010709.000|20110109010711.000|TR0|the federal bench for a number of years, 
20110109010711.000|20110109010713.000|TR0|before that he was a prosecutor for the 
20110109010713.000|20110109010715.000|TR0|Pima County attorneys office and he was 
20110109010715.000|20110109010717.000|TR0|also a county attorney (INAUDIBLE).
20110109010717.000|20110109010719.000|TR0|
20110109010719.000|20110109010720.000|TR0|One of the finest human beings I have ever 
20110109010720.000|20110109010722.000|TR0|met in my life.  He was a frequent 
20110109010722.000|20110109010724.000|TR0|attendant at daily mass downtown at the 
20110109010724.000|20110109010726.000|TR0|cathedral.  And this morning, he went to 
20110109010726.000|20110109010728.000|TR0|mass, and was going to come home and do 
20110109010728.000|20110109010730.000|TR0|the floors, which he always does on 
20110109010730.000|20110109010732.000|TR0|Saturday. Congresswoman Giffords was an 
20110109010732.000|20110109010734.000|TR0|incredibly gifted legislator.  She still 
20110109010734.000|20110109010736.000|TR0|is.  She's one of the nicest human beings 
20110109010736.000|20110109010738.000|TR0|that has ever been planted on this earth.  
20110109010738.000|20110109010740.000|TR0|She's not only brilliant.  She works from 
20110109010740.000|20110109010741.000|TR0|dawn until dawn basically and she cares 
20110109010741.000|20110109010743.000|TR0|what really happens in this country. She's 
20110109010743.000|20110109010745.000|TR0|not about Democrats or Republicans.  She's 
20110109010745.000|20110109010747.000|TR0|not about politics. All she cares about is 
20110109010747.000|20110109010749.000|TR0|the United States of America.
20110109010749.000|20110109010751.000|TR0|
20110109010751.000|20110109010753.000|TR0|And today I want to tell you, I hope that 
20110109010753.000|20110109010755.000|TR0|all Americans are saddened and as shocked 
20110109010755.000|20110109010757.000|TR0|as we are.  And I hope that some of them 
20110109010757.000|20110109010759.000|TR0|or most of them are as angry as I am and 
20110109010759.000|20110109010800.000|TR0|as a lot of us are.  And I think it's time 
20110109010800.000|20110109010802.000|TR0|as a country that we need to do a little 
20110109010802.000|20110109010804.000|TR0|soul-searching, because I think the 
20110109010804.000|20110109010806.000|TR0|vitriolic rhetoric that we hear day in and 
20110109010806.000|20110109010808.000|TR0|day out from people in the radio business 
20110109010808.000|20110109010810.000|TR0|and some people in the TV business and 
20110109010810.000|20110109010812.000|TR0|what see on TV and how our youngsters are 
20110109010812.000|20110109010814.000|TR0|being raised, that this has not become the 
20110109010814.000|20110109010816.000|TR0|nice United States of America that most of 
20110109010816.000|20110109010818.000|TR0|us grew up in.  And I think it's time that 
20110109010818.000|20110109010819.000|TR0|we do the soul-searching.
20110109010819.000|20110109010821.000|TR0|
20110109010821.000|20110109010823.000|TR0|Two brave individuals at this crime scene 
20110109010823.000|20110109010825.000|TR0|tackled the suspect, who is a white male, 
20110109010825.000|20110109010827.000|TR0|22 years old, and at this point, we're not 
20110109010827.000|20110109010829.000|TR0|able to divulge his name.  He has kind of 
20110109010829.000|20110109010831.000|TR0|a troubled past, I can tell you that.  And 
20110109010831.000|20110109010833.000|TR0|we're not convinced that he acted alone.
20110109010833.000|20110109010835.000|TR0|
20110109010835.000|20110109010837.000|TR0|There's some reason to believe that he 
20110109010837.000|20110109010839.000|TR0|came to this location with another 
20110109010839.000|20110109010840.000|TR0|individual.  And there's reason to believe 
20110109010840.000|20110109010842.000|TR0|that the other individual in some way may 
20110109010842.000|20110109010844.000|TR0|be involved.  I know all that does is 
20110109010844.000|20110109010846.000|TR0|pique your curiosity and you'll have a 
20110109010846.000|20110109010848.000|TR0|million questions, but based on the advice 
20110109010848.000|20110109010850.000|TR0|of legal counsel, we're not going to be 
20110109010850.000|20110109010852.000|TR0|able to give you any more information on
